title: Toronto International Film Festival (TIFF)
description: One of the world's premier film festivals showcasing international and Canadian cinema.

title: Caribana Festival
description: North America's largest Caribbean carnival celebration with music, dance, and cuisine.

title: Taste of Toronto
description: A culinary celebration featuring the city's best restaurants and food vendors.

title: Luminato Festival
description: Multi-arts festival celebrating music, theater, dance, and visual arts.

title: Toronto Pride
description: Celebration of LGBTQ+ communities with parades, performances, and events.
